channel.description: Recent content in Contacts on ZWallet

item.title: Docs: Add/Edit/Delete
item.description:
1. Tap to open the QR code scanner
  2. An address should be assigned to a single contact

item.title: Docs: Save to Blockchain
item.description:
Changes to your contacts are first saved locally on your device.

  1. Tap this button if you want to store them in the blockchain. The app will make a transaction that saves your contact list. It costs 0.01 mY/ZEC

Remarks

  • Contacts that are saved in the blockchain are recovered when the account is restored from its seed
